greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence related to the o.g.f.s. of the right hand columns of the EG1 triangle A162005.
comment: The a(n) are the sums of the coefficients of the polynomials that appear in the numerators of the o.g.f.s. of the right hand columns of the EG1 triangle A162005, see the examples.
example: The polynomials in the numerators of the first few o.g.f.s are:
xref: A000012, A004004 (2x), A162008, A162009 and A162010 are the first five right hand columns of the EG1 triangle A162005.
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Jun 27 2009
